content:
@WG-prioritization/alerts issue #89522 has been requested for prioritization.

Procedure

  • Priority?
  • Regression?
  • Notify people/groups?
  • Needs I-nominated?

I've been monitoring this issue since it was opened. basically this affects gentoo's sandoboxed build system but the repercussions seems to go deeper. there seems to be a fix now. I'll try a P-medium while keeping it tracked. we may raise the alert level if needed.
